description.text: Fight over the causeway or branch out to the towers. One Cube and a Base.

ru.original: Fight over the causeway or branch out to the towers. One Cube and a Base.
ru.translation: Сражайтесь на насыпи или пробивайся к башням. Один куб и база.

es.original: Fight over the causeway or branch out to the towers. One Cube and a Base.
es.translation:
Cruza el viaducto o sube a las torres. 
Un generador y un núcleo.

de.original: Fight over the causeway or branch out to the towers. One Cube and a Base.
de.translation: Kämpft euch über den Damm oder nutzt die Türme. Ein Generator und eine Basis.

pt.original: Fight over the causeway or branch out to the towers. One Cube and a Base.
pt.translation: Trave uma emocionante batalha neste clássico cenário. Um Cubo e uma Base.

fr.original: Fight over the causeway or branch out to the towers. One Cube and a Base.
fr.translation: Affrontez-vous sur la chaussée ou partez à l'assaut des tours. Un cube et une base.
